I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

forall (h : name) (t : list output) (tr : list (name * (input + list output))), inputs_m ((h, inr t) :: tr) = inputs_m tr

Inductive step_s (P : BaseParams) (params : SingleParams P) : step_relation data (input + output) := SST_deliver : forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : list output) (tr : list (input + output)), input_handler i s = (out, s') -> tr = inl i :: map inr out -> step_s s s' tr Arguments step_s {P params} Arguments SST_deliver {P params} [i] _ [s'] [out tr]%list_scope
StepFailureDiskOp_deliver : forall (net net' : do_network) (failed : list do_name) (p : do_packet) (xs ys : list do_packet) (ops : list (disk_op file_name)) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (do_name * do_msg)), nwdoPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (do_pDst p) failed ->...-> step_failure_disk_ops (failed, net) (failed, net') [(do_pDst p, inr out)] where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?disk_op_failure_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
Inductive step_ordered (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation ordered_network (Net.name * (input + output)) := StepOrdered_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + output))) (m : Net.msg) (ms : list Net.msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) (from to : Net.name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_ordered net net' tr Arguments step_ordered {P params} Arguments StepOrdered_deliver {P params} _ [net'] [tr]%list_scope [m] [ms out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope _ [to] Arguments StepOrdered_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [tr out]%list_scope [inp d] [l]%list_scope
step_async_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_async_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
StepFailure_fail : forall (h : Net.name) (net : network) (failed : list Net.name), step_failure (failed, net) (h :: failed, net) [] where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- FailureParams ?P]
StepFailureDiskOp_fail : forall (h : do_name) (net : do_network) (failed : list do_name), step_failure_disk_ops (failed, net) (h :: failed, net) [] where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?disk_op_failure_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
step_dup_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_dup_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
StepFailure_dup : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwPackets := p :: xs ++ p :: ys; nwState := nwState net |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [] where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- FailureParams ?P]
